resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81969</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81969</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4399</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Earthworms Preferred Soil Conditions</string>
            <string language="es">Las condiciones de tierra preferidas de las lombrices</string>
            <string language="ga">Na cúinsí Cré is fearr le Cuiteoigí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regenwurme Bevorzugte Boden-Zustände</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">États de Sol Préférés Par Vers de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condições Preferidas Minhocas Do Solo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stati Del Terreno Preferiti Earthworms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προτιμημένοι γεωσκώληκες εδαφολογικοί όροι</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Experiment that examines the type of soil conditions most preferred by earthworms. Can be conducted in a single class.</string>
            <string language="es">Experimento que examina el tipo de las condiciones de tierra preferidas por las lombrices. Puede ser llevado a cabo en una clase de un período.</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh a scrúdaíonn an cineál cré is fearr leis an chuid is mó de chuiteoigí. Is féidir é a dhéanamh i rang singil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Agricultural Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht Talmhaíochta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Experiment</string>
            <string language="es">Agricultura. Experimento</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experimentieren Sie, das den Typen der 
Bodenzustände überprüft, die am meisten durch Regenwurme bevorzugt 
werden. Kann in eine einzelne Kategorie geleitet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérimentez qui examine le type d'états de sol 
plus préférés par des vers de terre. Peut être conduit dans 
une classe simple.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experimente que examina o tipo de condições do 
solo preferidas mais por minhocas. Pode ser conduzido em uma 
única classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sperimenti che esamina il tipo di stati del 
terreno più preferiti dai earthworms. Può essere condotto in 
un singolo codice categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα που εξετάζει τον τύπο εδαφολογικών όρων που 
προτιμώνται από τους γεωσκώληκες. Μπορέστε να διευθυνθείτε 
σε μια ενιαία κλάση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Agrarwissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Science Agronomique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência Agricultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza Agricola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωργική επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
